name.description:
The unique name of the configuration item.
Must consist of uppercase letters and underscores only.

description.description: A human-readable description of the configuration items purpose.

value.description:
The initial value for the configuration item, serialized as a string.
Must conform to the format required by OpenShock.API.Controller.Admin.DTOs.ConfigurationAddItemRequest.Type.

ConfigurationAddItemRequest.description: Request DTO for adding a new configuration item.

name.description: The unique name of the configuration item.

description.description: A human-readable description of what this configuration item controls.

value.description: The current value of the configuration item, serialized as a string.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the configuration was last updated.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the configuration was originally created.

ConfigurationItemDto.description: Data transfer object representing a configuration item.

name.description:
The name of the configuration item to update.
Must consist only of uppercase letters and underscores.

description.description: (Optional) New description for the configuration item.

value.description:
(Optional) New value for the configuration item.
Must match the format expected by its existing OpenShock.Common.OpenShockDb.ConfigurationValueType.

ConfigurationUpdateItemRequest.description:
Request DTO for updating a configuration item.
Either OpenShock.API.Controller.Admin.DTOs.ConfigurationUpdateItemRequest.Description or OpenShock.API.Controller.Admin.DTOs.ConfigurationUpdateItemRequest.Value (or both) may be provided.
If both are null, no update action is performed.

data.title: PauseReason
data.description:
An integer representing the reason(s) for the shocker being paused, expressed as a bitfield where reasons are OR'd together.

Each bit corresponds to:
- 1: Shocker
- 2: UserShare
- 4: PublicShare

For example, a value of 6 (2 | 4) indicates both 'UserShare' and 'PublicShare' reasons.

paused.title: PauseReason
paused.description:
An integer representing the reason(s) for the shocker being paused, expressed as a bitfield where reasons are OR'd together.

Each bit corresponds to:
- 1: Shocker
- 2: UserShare
- 4: PublicShare

For example, a value of 6 (2 | 4) indicates both 'UserShare' and 'PublicShare' reasons.
